Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
Speeder \Speed"er\, n. 1. One who, or that which, speeds. [1913 Webster]
2. (Spinning) A machine for drawing and twisting slivers to form rovings. [1913 Webster]
speeder n : a driver who exceeds the safe speed limit [syn: {speed demon}]
